bug.author: djthegr8
bug.description:
Please make sure that this is a bug. As per our GitHub Policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests and build/installation issues on GitHub. tag:bug_template System information
Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow.js): No OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Win7 Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: N/A TensorFlow.js installed from (npm or script link): bundle, I believe TensorFlow.js version (use command below): N/A Browser version: Chrome Tensorflow.js Converter Version: N/A
When the Handpose demo is opened at <denchmark-link:https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-models/demos/handpose/index.html>this site</denchmark-link> then it errors with the console showing the below Error. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44142719/98674628-18462100-237f-11eb-8dba-e9674ee987a3.png></denchmark-link>
Describe the expected behavior Works as required Standalone code to reproduce the issue Provide a reproducible test case that is the bare minimum necessary to generate the problem. If possible, please share a link to Colab/CodePen/any notebook. N/A Other info / logs Include any logs or source code that would be helpful to diagnose the problem. If including tracebacks, please include the full traceback. Large logs and files should be attached. N/A

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/djthegr8>@djthegr8</denchmark-link> I tried on windows 10 and it is working as expected , I don't have a Win7 machine to reproduce the same.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rthadur>@rthadur</denchmark-link> I opened in a Windows 10 laptop, please check using the WASM backend. My console output is below <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44142719/98942879-af90ad00-2514-11eb-8bed-457216d8e311.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/djthegr8>@djthegr8</denchmark-link> It was running fine on my machine , can you please provide your system specs, Thank you. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/annxingyuan>@annxingyuan</denchmark-link>
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed in 7 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you.

Have added a PR to update the demo, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/pull/539>tensorflow/tfjs-models#539</denchmark-link> while also adding proper WASM SIMD support, as the model ops don't fit on the standard WASM backend.

Have attempted to resolve in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/pull/539>#539 in tfjs-models</denchmark-link> , kindly review...
PR merged, will await push to demo
